title: Define MVP evaluation dataset spec (lightweight labels)
scope: Define a compact dataset format for evaluation (frame ranges, player IDs for a few sequences, ball visibility windows, goal timestamps).
Keep it lightweight so it can be maintained without a labeling platform.
Provide at least one synthetic/fixture dataset to run in CI.
acceptance: A schema and example dataset file exist under pipeline fixtures.
Dataset supports identity swap checks and break rate evaluation for selected windows.
Dataset is deterministic and does not require committing real video.

deliverables.title: Evaluation dataset schema and fixture
acceptance: Fixture is small, deterministic, and supports swap/break evaluation logic.

subtasks.title: Add schema + fixture dataset for CI evaluation.
done_when: mvp_eval.schema.json exists and validates the fixture.
mvp_eval_fixture.json exists and is used by evaluation code.
